magic_items.name: Ring of Invisibility
magic_items.description: While wearing this ring, the wearer can turn invisible at will. The effect lasts for up to 1 hour per day, divided into increments of the wearer's choosing.
properties: While invisible, the wearer is immune to damage from non-magical weapons.
The wearer cannot attack or cast spells while invisible.

magic_items.name: Sword of Life Stealing
magic_items.description: This black-bladed longsword has a silver hilt and a glowing red gem set into the pommel. Whenever the wielder scores a critical hit, the sword steals 1d6 hit points from the target.
properties: The sword glows dimly in the presence of undead creatures.
The sword grants the wielder temporary hit points equal to the amount of hit points stolen.
